document.full_text: peru's nationalist presidential candidate ollanta humala is running ahead of conservative keiko fujimori, daughter of jailed former leader alberto fujimori, leading up to the june 5 election, said a poll published on sunday.
document.title: humala leads fujimori in peru presidential race
lines_and_colors: peru's nationalist presidential candidate ollanta humala is running ahead of conservative keiko fujimori, daughter of jailed former leader alberto fujimori, leading up to the june 5 election, said a poll published on sunday.
